FROM maven:3.8-eclipse-temurin-17 AS build
# Set up working directory for building WORKDIR /app
# Copy project files COPY pom.xml . COPY src ./src
# Build the application with explicit output RUN echo "Starting Maven build..." && \ mvn clean compile package -DskipTests -X && \ echo "Build completed. Checking target directory:" && \ ls -la /app/target/
# Verify the JAR file was created RUN if [ ! -f "/app/target/restaurant-management-system-1.0.0.jar" ]; then \ echo "ERROR: JAR file not found! Available files:"; \ ls -la /app/target/; \ exit 1; \ else \ echo "SUCCESS: JAR file created successfully"; \ ls -la /app/target/restaurant-management-system-1.0.0.jar; \ fi
# Runtime stage FROM eclipse-temurin:17-jre
# Install PostgreSQL client and other utilities RUN apt-get update && \ apt-get install -y postgresql-client curl && \ apt-get clean && \ rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
WORKDIR /app
# Copy the JAR file from build stage COPY --from=build /app/target/restaurant-management-system-1.0.0.jar /app/app.jar
# Copy resources COPY --from=build /app/src/main/resources/ /app/resources/
# Verify JAR file exists in runtime RUN ls -la /app/ && \ echo "Verifying JAR contents:" && \ jar -tf /app/app.jar | head -20
# Expose the port EXPOSE 8080
# Set environment variables ENV JAVA_OPTS="-Xmx512m -Xms256m"
# Run the application CMD ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"]

version: '3.8'
services: # PostgreSQL Database postgres: image: postgres:15-alpine container_name: restaurant_db environment: POSTGRES_DB: restaurant_management POSTGRES_USER: restaurant_user POSTGRES_PASSWORD: restaurant_password POSTGRES_INITDB_ARGS: "--encoding=UTF8" ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data networks: - restaurant_network restart: unless-stopped healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U restaurant_user -d restaurant_management"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5
# Database Migration Service migrations: image: postgres:15-alpine container_name: restaurant_migrations environment: PGPASSWORD: restaurant_password volumes: - ./migrations:/migrations:ro networks: - restaurant_network depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy profiles: - migrations command: > sh -c " echo 'Waiting for database to be ready...'; sleep 5; echo 'Creating fresh database for migrations...'; psql -h postgres -U restaurant_user -d postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS restaurant_management_new;'; psql -h postgres -U restaurant_user -d postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE restaurant_management_new;'; echo 'Running migrations on new database...'; for file in /migrations/*.sql; do if [ -f \"\$$file\" ]; then echo \"Applying migration: \$$file\"; psql -h postgres -U restaurant_user -d restaurant_management_new -f \"\$$file\"; fi; done; echo 'Migration completed successfully!'; echo 'New database: restaurant_management_new'; "
# Restaurant Management Application restaurant_app: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile container_name: restaurant_management_app environment: - DB_HOST=postgres - DB_PORT=5432 - DB_NAME=restaurant_management - DB_USER=restaurant_user - DB_PASSWORD=restaurant_password - SIMULATION_MODE=true - JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx512m -Xms256m ports: - "8080:8080" depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy networks: - restaurant_network restart: unless-stopped stdin_open: true tty: true volumes: - app_logs:/app/logs command: ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar", "simulate"]
# Authentication Simulation Service (separate profile) auth_simulation: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile container_name: restaurant_auth_simulation environment: - DB_HOST=postgres - DB_PORT=5432 - DB_NAME=restaurant_management - DB_USER=restaurant_user - DB_PASSWORD=restaurant_password - SIMULATION_MODE=true - JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx512m -Xms256m depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy networks: - restaurant_network profiles: - simulation command: ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar", "simulate"]
# Optional: PgAdmin for database management pgadmin: image: dpage/pgadmin4:latest container_name: restaurant_pgadmin environment: PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL: admin@restaurant.com PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD: admin123 PGADMIN_CONFIG_SERVER_MODE: 'False' ports: - "5050:80" depends_on: - postgres networks: - restaurant_network restart: unless-stopped profiles: - admin
networks: restaurant_network: driver: bridge name: restaurant_network
volumes: postgres_data: driver: local name: restaurant_postgres_data app_logs: driver: local name: restaurant_app_logs

#!/bin/bash set -e
# Create database and users before migrations run psql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 --username "$POSTGRES_USER" --dbname "$POSTGRES_DB" <<-EOSQL CREATE DATABASE restaurant_management; CREATE USER restaurant_user WITH PASSWORD 'restaurant_password'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE restaurant_management TO restaurant_user; EOSQL
# Apply schema migrations to the restaurant_management database echo "Running initial schema migrations..." for f in /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/*.sql; do if [ -f "\$f" ]; then echo "Applying migration: \$f" psql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 --username "$POSTGRES_USER" --dbname restaurant_management -f "\$f" fi done
echo "Database initialization completed successfully"
